description: This file contains utility functions related to analyzing and processing ELF files, stripping binaries, and handling shared libraries in the context of embedded or Linux-based systems. It includes functions for determining file types, stripping debug symbols, and managing shared library dependencies.

methods.name: runstrip(arg)
methods.description: Strips debug symbols and sections from a binary file based on its type and attributes.

methods.name: is_kernel_module(path)
methods.description: Detects if the given file is a kernel module by searching for 'vermagic='.

methods.name: is_kernel_module_signed(path)
methods.description: Checks whether a kernel module (.ko) file is signed by reading its tail.

methods.name: is_elf(path)
methods.description: Determines if a file is an ELF file, and its characteristics such as executable, shared library, or kernel module.

methods.name: is_static_lib(path)
methods.description: Checks if a file is a static library (.a) and not a symlink.

methods.name: strip_execs(pn, dstdir, strip_cmd, libdir, base_libdir, d, qa_already_stripped=False)
methods.description: Utility to strip executable and shared library files in a directory tree.

methods.name: file_translate(file)
methods.description: Sanitizes filenames by replacing special characters with tokens.

methods.name: filedeprunner(arg)
methods.description: Processes package files to determine their dependencies and provisions.

methods.name: read_shlib_providers(d)
methods.description: Reads shared library provider information from specific directories.

ctags.name: process_deps
ctags.pattern: /^    def process_deps(pipe, pkg, pkgdest, provides, requires):$/

ctags.name: strip_execs
ctags.pattern: /^def strip_execs(pn, dstdir, strip_cmd, libdir, base_libdir, d, qa_already_stripped=False):$/
ctags.signature: (pn, dstdir, strip_cmd, libdir, base_libdir, d, qa_already_stripped=False)
